Name: UniverseV: Star Domination
About the game: Conquer the galaxy and defeat the mysterious elder race in this amazing 2D turn-based strategy game. To do this, you will have to build your own fleets with different ships equipped with modules of your choice. Your conquest will be supported by special game cards different for each race. These game cards can dramatically change the situation on the battlefield. You will be able to play 5 different regular races, and 2 extra races. Each race has its own ships, modules for these ships, and game cards that really can be the game-changers. You will have to fight in 6 completely different arenas where each arena has its own unique abilities that dramatically can change your strategy during the battle. 1 player campaign mode 1-4 local players skirmish mode
